body_html: I'm just not convinced that it's a good API. It's a very simple thing, and we're making the interface of a module unnecessarily complex. Also, as I mentioned, returning 3 values of the same type makes it extremely easy to mix them up, and there's really no way to remember what this function does without looking it up in the docs every time. On the other hand, if you had this code in your project, it would be much harder to make a mistake.
